trans-unit.source: Allows the <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer> to recognize a type when it serializes or deserializes an object as encoded SOAP XML.
trans-unit.target: Gjør den <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer>ikke gjenkjenne en type når det serializes eller deserializes et objekt som kodet SOAP-XMLEN.</xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer>

trans-unit.source: The SoapIncludeAttribute class belongs to a family of attributes that controls how the <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer> serializes, or deserializes, an object as encoded SOAP XML.
trans-unit.target: SoapIncludeAttribute klassen hører til en serie med attributter som styrer hvordan <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer>serializes eller deserializes et objekt som kodet SOAP-XML.</xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer>

trans-unit.source: The resulting XML conforms to section 5 of the World Wide Web Consortium (www.w3.org) document, "Simple Object Access Protocol (SOAP) 1.1".
trans-unit.target: Resulterende XML overholder delen 5 dokumenttypen World Wide Web Consortium (www.w3.org), "Simple Object Access Protocol (SOAP) 1.1".

trans-unit.source: For a complete list of similar attributes, see [Attributes That Control Encoded SOAP Serialization](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: For en fullstendig liste over lignende attributter, kan du se [attributter som kontrollen kodet SOAP serialisering](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: To serialize an object as an encoded SOAP message, you must construct the <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer> using an <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlTypeMapping> created with the <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapReflectionImporter.ImportTypeMapping%2A> method of the <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapReflectionImporter> class.
trans-unit.target: For å serialisere et objekt som en kodet SOAP-melding, må du konstruere <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer>ved hjelp av en <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlTypeMapping>opprettet med en <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapReflectionImporter.ImportTypeMapping%2A>metode i <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapReflectionImporter>klasse.</xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapReflectionImporter> </xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapReflectionImporter.ImportTypeMapping%2A> </xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlTypeMapping> </xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer>

trans-unit.source: When applying the SoapIncludeAttribute, specify the <xref:System.Type> of the derived class.
trans-unit.target: Når du bruker SoapIncludeAttribute, angi den <xref:System.Type>i den utledede klassen.</xref:System.Type>

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer> serializes objects that include both the base and the derived classes, it can then recognize both object types.
trans-unit.target: Når den <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer>serializes objekter som inkluderer både grunntallet og avledede klasser det deretter gjenkjenner begge objekttyper.</xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer>

trans-unit.source: You can use the SoapIncludeAttribute to include derived classes in service description documents that are written in the Web Services Description Language (WSDL).
trans-unit.target: Du kan bruke SoapIncludeAttribute inkludere avledede klasser i tjenesten beskrivelse dokumenter som er skrevet i Web Services beskrivelse språket (WSDL).

trans-unit.source: For example, if a method returns an <xref:System.Object>, apply the SoapIncludeAttribute to the method and specify the actual types that should be returned.
trans-unit.target: Hvis en metode returnerer for eksempel en <xref:System.Object>, gjelder SoapIncludeAttribute metoden, og angi faktiske typene som skal returneres.</xref:System.Object>

trans-unit.source: For more information about WSDL, see World Wide Web Consortium (www.w3.org) specification, "Web Services Description Language (WSDL) 1.1".
trans-unit.target: For mer informasjon om WSDL, kan du se spesifikasjonen World Wide Web Consortium (www.w3.org), "Web Services Description Language (WSDL) 1.1".

trans-unit.source: For more information about using attributes, see [Attributes](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Du finner mer informasjon om hvordan du bruker attributter [attributter](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Xml.Serialization.SoapIncludeAttribute"></xref> class using the specified type.
trans-unit.target: Initialiserer en ny forekomst av den <xref href="System.Xml.Serialization.SoapIncludeAttribute"> </xref> klasse ved hjelp av den angitte typen.

trans-unit.source: Apply multiple instances of the <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapIncludeAttribute> to a field or property that returns either an array of objects, an <xref:System.Collections.ArrayList> that contains a collection of objects, or an object that can return multiple types.
trans-unit.target: Bruk flere forekomster av den <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapIncludeAttribute>til et felt eller en egenskap som returnerer enten en matrise av objekter, en <xref:System.Collections.ArrayList>som inneholder en samling av objekter eller et objekt som kan returnere flere typer.</xref:System.Collections.ArrayList> </xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapIncludeAttribute>

trans-unit.source: Set the <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapIncludeAttribute.Type%2A> property for each type that you want the field or property to contain.
trans-unit.target: Angi den <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapIncludeAttribute.Type%2A>egenskapen for hver ønskede feltet eller til å inneholde.</xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapIncludeAttribute.Type%2A>

trans-unit.source: The type of the object to include.
trans-unit.target: Typen for objektet som skal inkluderes.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the type of the object to use when serializing or deserializing an object.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir objekttypen som skal brukes når serialisering eller deserialisering av et objekt.

trans-unit.source: Apply multiple instances of the <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapIncludeAttribute> to a field or property that returns either an array of objects, an <xref:System.Collections.ArrayList> that contains a collection of objects, or an object that can return multiple types.
trans-unit.target: Bruk flere forekomster av den <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapIncludeAttribute>til et felt eller en egenskap som returnerer enten en matrise av objekter, en <xref:System.Collections.ArrayList>som inneholder en samling av objekter eller et objekt som kan returnere flere typer.</xref:System.Collections.ArrayList> </xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapIncludeAttribute>

trans-unit.source: Set the Type property for each type that you want the field or property to contain.
trans-unit.target: Angitt Type-egenskapen for hver ønskede feltet eller til å inneholde.

trans-unit.source: The type of the object to include.
trans-unit.target: Typen for objektet som skal inkluderes.
